Tutup Akhir Pekan, Rupiah Menguat Rp14.038/USD
01 Nov 2019, 21:24 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Tutup Akhir Pekan, Rupiah Menguat Rp14.038/USD

KBRN, Jakarta : Jelang akhir pekan, nilai tukar Rupiah terhadap Dolar AS awalnya melemah di angka Rp14.066 pada perdagangan Jumat (1/11/2019).Hal itu terpantau dari kegiatan petugas yang sibuk menghitung uang pecahan dolar AS di Plaza Mandiri, Jakarta, hari ini.Akan tetapi, nilai tukar rupiah kembali menguat di posisi Rp14.038 per dolar AS pada perdagangan pasar spot, Jumat sore (1/11/2019). Posisi tersebut menguat 4 poin atau 0,03 persen dari Rp14.042 per dolar AS pada Kamis sore, 31 Oktober 2019 lalu.Sementara kurs referensi Bank Indonesia (BI), Jakarta Interbank Spot Dollar Rate (Jisdor) menempatkan rupiah di posisi Rp14.066 per dolar AS atau melemah dari kemarin di Rp14.008 per dolar AS.Selain pengaruh eksternal yakni perang dagang AS-Tiongkok, serta penetapan suku bunga oleh The Feds, rupiah berhasil menguat karena pengaruh sentimen domestik. Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) baru saja merilis data inflasi sebesar 0,02 persen pada Oktober 2019. Inflasi yang rendah menandakan ada optimisme pada pertumbuhan ekonomi ke depan, sehingga Rupiah kembali stabil di harga yang wajar.

Closed on Weekends, Rupiah Strengthened IDR14,038 / USD
01 Nov 2019, 21:24 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Closed on Weekends, Rupiah Strengthened IDR14,038 / USD

KBRN, Jakarta: Towards the end of the week, the Rupiah exchange rate against the US Dollar initially weakened to Rp14,066 in trading Friday (1/11/2019). It was observed from the activities of officers who were busy calculating US dollar denominations at Plaza Mandiri, Jakarta , today. However, the rupiah exchange rate strengthened again in the position of Rp14,038 per US dollar in spot market trading, Friday afternoon (1/11/2019). The position strengthened 4 points or 0.03 percent from Rp14,042 per US dollar on Thursday afternoon, October 31, 2019. While the reference rate of Bank Indonesia (BI), the Jakarta Interbank Spot Dollar Rate (Jisdor) placed the rupiah in the position of Rp14,066 per US dollar or weakening from yesterday at Rp 14,008 per US dollar. Apart from the external influence of the US-China trade war, as well as the determination of interest rates by The Feds, the rupiah managed to strengthen due to the influence of domestic sentiment. The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) has just released inflation data of 0.02 percent in October 2019. Low inflation indicates optimism for future economic growth, so that the Rupiah has stabilized at a reasonable price.
